name: manifestation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a sign of something existing or happening: She claimed that the rise in unemployment was just a further manifestation of the government's incompetence.
[ U ] appearance: Unlike acid rain or deforestation, global warming has no visible manifestation.

a sign showing the existence of a particular condition: His refusal to see us was a manifestation of his guilt.
